reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater fits well, with one noting it hits about mid-hip, and appreciate its quality, style, and color, with one mentioning its beautiful baby cable design. The garment is soft, comfortable, and warm, making it suitable for colder weather. Customers consider it a great value for the price.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality of material for the price. I will buy another one.
items.body: I am really happy with the fit and quality of this sweater. It's soft and warm. I'm short and the small fits me well. It's not too long. Read more
items.author: Trish Jenne

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!
items.body: Love it! Good quality, washes well and fits true to size. Love the color and cable style. Warm yet not too much. Can wear under blazer to dress up. Read more
items.author: Claudia

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks more expensive than it is!
items.body: This sweater is well made, and looks as good as sweaters that cost a lot more. It fits well and it still looks great (maybe better) after going in the washer and dryer. It didn't shrink at all. It hits about mid-hip, so it looks good with pants as well as skirts. I plan to order another one in a different color. Read more
items.author: anonymous

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love LOMON Turtleneck Cable Knit sweater!
items.body: Baby cable medium weight grey sweater. Very nice fit. Amazon recommended a sizing for me. I ordered as Amazon sizing recommendation. Great fit and I'm so pleased. Color Gray is soft gray and baby cable is so beautiful. Read more
items.author: @ Sonoma 5

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and comfortable
items.body: Soft and moderately thick sweater. It is comfortable to wear. It is true to size. The color matches the picture Read more
items.author: Livejoy

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Size down
items.body: Runs big, size down Read more
items.author: AJS

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater
items.body: Nice weight, hangs well. Im 5'4", 118 lbs. Medium is a looser fit, but not baggy on me - this is what I wanted. I could have gone with Small for a slimmer fit. Read more
items.author: Kara Taylor

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Turtleneck
items.body: Should have paid more attention, turtleneck just to tight just didn’t fit for me Nice sweater if not a turtleneck, I would have kept it Read more
items.author: Jrehene

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Indigo Blue, Purple Taupe, Khaki, Pink, White, Deep Green, Beige, Black, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
